programme.desc: After a girl is assaulted, two priests must determine if she was attacked by an evil spirit or a molester.

programme.title: A Millionaires First Love
programme.desc: To inherit his grandfathers fortune, Jae-kyung has to transfer to a school in the countryside. He fell in love with a pretty girl Eun-hwan and is going to know about her secrets...

programme.title: Joseon Chefs
programme.desc: A nobleman who has passed the national civil service exam meets the self-proclaimed best chef in Joseon, falls into the world of gourmet food, and sets out to find the life he truly wants.

programme.title: Smugglers
programme.desc: The haenyeos are having trouble with collecting seafood under water because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they started doing smuggling business...

programme.title: The Moon
programme.desc: An astronaut is left stranded in space because of an accident during a spaceflight. The former director of the space centre strives to bring him home safely...

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesnt last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: A man who became a suspect in a closed-door murder seeks help from an attorney to prove him innocent. As they begin to piece the puzzle together, the truth slowly reverses.

programme.title: Deadman
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E079
programme.desc: Florencia ruega a Nicols se casen cuanto antes, pues esa es la nica manera en que ella podr sentirse segura de que el se va a quedar a su lado para siempre. Hilario piensa en que era verdad la leyenda de que cuando el caballo del dueo de Cantarrana se pierde le cambia la vida a su patron, pues eso le paso a el. Felipe asegura a Clementina que ella es el amor de su vida y la mujer con quien quiere casarse, pero la muchacha est convencida de que el siempre ha preferido a Antonieta. Adelaida se impresiona cuando Hilario asegura estar dispuesto a firmar los papeles del divorcio porque quiere encontrar un nuevo camino para enrumbar su vida. Victoria le confa a Clementina que acaba de enterarse de que Nicols va a casarse con Florencia; ambas jovenes tratan de apoyarse en ese difcil momento que cada una est pasando por culpa de sus enamorados. Hilario le da las gracias a Hansen por haberlo ayudado a salir en libertad, pero le aclara que nunca va a perdonarle que siga intentando conquistar a Adelaida. Victoria asegura a Caravaggio que no le interesa conocer al tal Sergio Escalante porque no cree que pueda volver a enamorarse.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E080
programme.desc: Nicols asegura a Victoria que, aunque vaya a casarse con Florencia y quiere tratar de amarla, no puede porque es de ella de quien el sigue enamorado. Florencia acusa sorpresa cuando Hilario se presenta ante ella con un ramo de flores y con la esperanza de que haya entendido que la vida la puso en su camino para que el pueda olvidarse de todo lo dems. Victoria no entiende la actitud de Nicols; que insiste en que la ama, pero se va a casar con Florencia; a la joven Guanipa le parece un verdadero descaro del joven que le manifieste amor cuando est a punto de casarse con otra mujer a la que obviamente tampoco respeta. Florencia le insiste a Hilario en que no le hable de amor, pues ella se va a casar con Nicols Del Casal, noticia que causa gran impresion al seor Guanipa. Victoria le confa a Clementina que ya empezo a aceptar que Nicols escogio a Florencia y no a ella para compartir su vida. Victoria, que no cree que Fernanda le devuelva Cantarrana, le ruega a Nicols que no vaya a vivir a la que fue su casa con Florencia, quien aparece en ese momento y, aparte de advertirle a la joven Guanipa que ellos vivirn donde les parezca, la insta a entender de una vez que ella ya no cuenta para nada en la vida de Nicols.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E89
programme.desc: Camila, que ha llevado a Chantal a vivir en la Mansion. Marcelina le dice que su hijo decidio casarse con Astrid. Sebastin interrumpe la ceremonia de Julia y Gregorio. Torrealba detiene a Anton. Rosa Blanco regresar y Fausto pide a Fernando que acabe con ella.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E90
programme.desc: Camila se entera la muerte de Rosa Blanco. Todos le dan sus condolencias y Max la llama para ofrecerle su apoyo. Luciano, que fue el que trajo la noticia de la muerte. Sebastin no logra impedir el matrimonio de Julia y Gregorio. Leandro defiende su relacion con Jeli.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E109
programme.desc: Tamara is impressed when Valadro tells her that Illis suggested that Pastora is not her mother.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E110
programme.desc: Ral receives an overwhelmed Clara Ines, he senses a strong smell of liquor in her.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E109
programme.desc: Omar tells Lorena about the sentence given to Claudio, she is happy; and although he did not want to involve Gertrudis, Lorena assures that she will not rest until she sees her in prison - When the police are about to take Virginia into custody, Don Lucio arrives and clarifies that he authorized the young woman to bring Gael to meet Carmen - Paco shows up at the Coronas house, he wants to talk to Gertrudis to renegotiate the agreement they made when the crime occurred.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E85
programme.desc: Adriana se emociona al ver la hermosa velada que ha preparado Carlos Ral para ella; la pareja se deja llevar por sus sentimientos y consuman el profundo amor que se profesan.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E86
programme.desc: Carlos Ral, formalmente pide la mano de Adriana a Matilde para contraer matrimonio.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E87
programme.desc: Carlos Ral le advierte a Adriana que ante tantas adversidades deben estar preparados para todo lo malo y fortalecer su amor.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E90
programme.desc: Camila se entera la muerte de Rosa Blanco. Todos le dan sus condolencias y Max la llama para ofrecerle su apoyo. Luciano, que fue el que trajo la noticia de la muerte. Sebastin no logra impedir el matrimonio de Julia y Gregorio. Leandro defiende su relacion con Jeli.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E91
programme.desc: Rosa engao a todos: no est muerta. Camila no lo sabe y contina devastada y ratifica el odio y la rabia contra aquellos que contribuyeron a la muerte de su madre. Astrid, feliz por la boda.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E110
programme.desc: Ral receives an overwhelmed Clara Ines, he senses a strong smell of liquor in her.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E111
programme.desc: Illis pretends to put a microphone in her sisters house but drops the device; she looks for it and Elisenda approaches.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E110
programme.desc: Alberto asks Patricia to divorce him from Lorena, she accepts because she understands that this is what they both want to do - Lorena is ready to leave the Corona house with Ignacio. She is just saying goodbye to Norma when Alberto arrives and when he sees the luggage he understands what is going on. The boy runs to his father and he embraces him with much feeling and emotion.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E111
programme.desc: Two-year transition - Lorena has finished her medical studies and is on call at a hospital emergency room. Paco appears there to tell her that he is willing to tell her everything he knows and the young woman reacts disappointed that he intends to reveal the truth after so long; however, she wants to hear what he came to tell her.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E86
programme.desc: Carlos Ral, formalmente pide la mano de Adriana a Matilde para contraer matrimonio.

programme.desc: El joven Ibez se deshace en atenciones para con Adriana cuando llega Carlos Ral dejndole claro a Santiago que Adriana ser su futura esposa.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E081
programme.desc: Nicols y Florencia se casan por lo civil. Fernanda devuelve Cantarrana a Hilario, pero sin la parte de las tierras que el le diera a Florencia. Florencia descubre que Nicols se caso con ella a cambio de que Fernanda le devolviera Cantarrana a Victoria.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E91
programme.desc: Rosa engao a todos: no est muerta. Camila no lo sabe y contina devastada y ratifica el odio y la rabia contra aquellos que contribuyeron a la muerte de su madre. Astrid, feliz por la boda.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E92
programme.desc: Octavia, ayuda a Astrid en la preparacion del matrimonio y disfruta pensando en lo que Camila siente. Esta y Max, muy dolidos sabe que deben olvidarse. Fausto, insiste en que Roger y Fernando planifiquen la muerte de Ezequiel.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E111
programme.desc: Illis pretends to put a microphone in her sisters house but drops the device; she looks for it and Elisenda approaches.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E112
programme.desc: Israel demands that Pastora leave her house; the woman lets it be known that Illis impersonated her.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E112
programme.desc: Gertrudis calls Michelle to get rid of Pacos lifeless body. It was very easy for her to kill for the second time, to the point of feeling very calm and affirming that this way she solves the problems very quickly. Norma discovers everything, but she is not willing to be an accomplice to a murder - Omar receives a call that breaks him down, some police officers found Pacos body.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E87
programme.desc: Carlos Ral le advierte a Adriana que ante tantas adversidades deben estar preparados para todo lo malo y fortalecer su amor.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E88
programme.desc: El joven Ibez se deshace en atenciones para con Adriana cuando llega Carlos Ral dejndole claro a Santiago que Adriana ser su futura esposa.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E080
programme.desc: Nicols asegura a Victoria que, aunque vaya a casarse con Florencia y quiere tratar de amarla, no puede porque es de ella de quien el sigue enamorado. Florencia acusa sorpresa cuando Hilario se presenta ante ella con un ramo de flores y con la esperanza de que haya entendido que la vida la puso en su camino para que el pueda olvidarse de todo lo dems. Victoria no entiende la actitud de Nicols; que insiste en que la ama, pero se va a casar con Florencia; a la joven Guanipa le parece un verdadero descaro del joven que le manifieste amor cuando est a punto de casarse con otra mujer a la que obviamente tampoco respeta. Florencia le insiste a Hilario en que no le hable de amor, pues ella se va a casar con Nicols Del Casal, noticia que causa gran impresion al seor Guanipa. Victoria le confa a Clementina que ya empezo a aceptar que Nicols escogio a Florencia y no a ella para compartir su vida. Victoria, que no cree que Fernanda le devuelva Cantarrana, le ruega a Nicols que no vaya a vivir a la que fue su casa con Florencia, quien aparece en ese momento y, aparte de advertirle a la joven Guanipa que ellos vivirn donde les parezca, la insta a entender de una vez que ella ya no cuenta para nada en la vida de Nicols.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S01:E06 - Mountain Monsters - Red Stag
programme.desc: After being dropped off into the mountains where there were only whispers and tales of mountain monsters being seen. Mario is on the search of the outer limits of the mountains to find himself a monster red deer.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S01:E07 - Boars and Prehistoric Fish
programme.desc: Mario returns to his home land in Australia to help a friend with some wild boar pest control and catch some prehistoric fish out of a billabong. Drama strikes and Mario finds himself in crocodile infested water plucking fish out.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S01:E08 - Birds of a Feather
programme.desc: Mario enjoys the camaraderie and challenge of duck hunting on opening day, and then teaches the audience how to cook an ancient Chinese recipe with one of the leading chefs of an award-winning restaurant from New Zealand.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E05 - Fishermans Catch
programme.desc: Bradley is looking to give a group of fishermen an unusual dinner - something totally unexpected. On the menu: sea snails followed by an ambitious sea cucumber dish and for the main course a Dungeness Crab Risotto.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E06 - Alutiq Anniversary
programme.desc: Its Game On for the Ewing Family as they plan a dinner to celebrate the 20th Anniversary of the AlutIq Museum. On the menu: clam fritters with kelp, kelp with rhubarb and cranberry jam, game meat with horse-radish mash potatoes with mushrooms, asparagus and leeks. The challenge is on to produce a memorable dinner from local ingredients for the Alutiq people and presenting it in a way that they have never had it before.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E07 - Bush Pilots Birthday
programme.desc: A Bush Pilots Birthday warrants a treat of a menu with pacific spot prawns and pasta to kick off this episodes menu followed by duck breast with celery root and for the main course there is rabbit and carrots.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E01 - A Family Affair
programme.desc: In the remote corners of the Alaskan bush country are bounties unlike any other. Rugged, raw and now cooked - this is the last culinary frontier where one chef is redefining what it means to eat like a wild man. Finicky clients, bi-polar weather changes, and food and supply shortages often push Bradley to the last ounce of his sanity but this creative, free-spirit always seems to deliver.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E02 - Surfers Delight
programme.desc: In the Planets ultimate test kitchen this episode serves up a special dinner for a group of surfers but there is a storm coming. This will be one to remember. On the menu a mixed green salad with a raspberry vinaigrette, whitefish gelatine with cucumber and corn relish following by seared halibut and polenta.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E03 - Hunters Paradise
programme.desc: Catering off the grid isnt easy and the Ewing Family knows it. A group of 8 hunters will be served a beet salad followed by braised venison and for desert cheesecake with lingonberries.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E04 - Celebration
programme.desc: Another 5 Star meal from the Ewing Family. This time it is a dinner for some local natives. Bradley decides to go on a hunt for a goat for the first course of slow braised goat ragout, followed by a fish risotto, and for the main course - curried goat with apple and rose hip chutney and to complete the dinner a chocolate molten lava cake for desert.

programme.title: Dropped - S01:E04 - The Rock Garden
programme.desc: On the third day at Prayer Point, Casey gets another chance... but not at the best moment. As Casey answers the call of nature, a bull answers back from the other side of the river, drawn in by the calls coming from the camp.

programme.title: Dropped - S01:E05 - Night Stalkers
programme.desc: With time flying by, the moose from Day 11 is nowhere to be seen, and the crew is left with more mysteries than solutions. Nocturnal creatures keep them on edge, making sleep elusive. During a day of scouting, they come across an old trappers cabin thats now occupied by a massive grizzly.

programme.title: Dropped - S01:E06 - Exploration Camp
programme.desc: The guys continue to push down river. Exhausted and starving, the brothers have barely enough energy to set camp. The guys discover is that sign is plentiful and the topography lends itself to moose habitat.

programme.title: Dropped - S01:E07 - Prayer Point
programme.desc: By the third day of moving along the river, everyone really needed a hunting camp to lift their spirits and keep pushing towards the goal of taking down a big bull. Tensions ran high and for the first time, the brothers confessed they were at a loss on how to proceed.

programme.title: Dropped - S01:E08 - King Of The Tundra
programme.desc: Casey sees a huge bull on the other side of the river and takes it down about 10 yards from the water. Then, another bull comes up the river towards the fallen one. Casey and this bull face off, staring each other down from opposite sides of the river.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E06 - Flood
programme.desc: When the levee breaks, the stuff really hits the fan. Desperate Hours looks at some of the most devastating floods in history including the flood of Rio De Janeiro in Brazil, the Louisiana floods in the United States, the Hamburg floods in Germany, the Uttarakhand floods in North India, and the Indian Ocean tsunami in Southeast Asia.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E07 - Geological Disasters
programme.desc: Sometimes, all that it takes is a shift underfoot. Desperate Hours looks at major geological disasters including avalanches in Afghanistan, Pakistan, Nepal, Peru, and France. It also looks at geological landslides in the Philippines, India and Columbia and an enormous sinkhole that consumed a pond in Bosnia. It also looks at Blizzards in the United States, Israel, and United Kingdom.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E08 - Nuclear Industrial
programme.desc: When humans are a serious danger to themselves ... Desperate Hours looks at nuclear and industrial disasters including the Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant disaster in Japan, the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant disaster in Ukraine, the Deepwater Oil Spill in the Gulf of Mexico, the Savar Plaza disaster in Bangladesh, and the Bhopal Gas disaster in India. When a catastrophic event strikes a nuclear power facility the resulting disaster can be, literally, off the scale and last for decades.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E09 - Disaster at Sea
programme.desc: Seafaring is a dangerous business indeed Desperate Hours looks at major disasters on the high seas including the Sewol Ferry disaster in South Korea, the Ferry Estonia in the Baltic Sea, the sinking of the Titanic, the Exxon Valdez in Prince William Sound Alaska, the Express Samina in Portes Islets, pirates attacking the Maersk Alabama and Seabourn Spirit, and the Costa Concordia in the Mediterranean Sea.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E10 - Disaster in the Air
programme.desc: Where the black box is the only story teller Airplane crashes are most peoples worst nightmares. Desperate Hours looks at major disasters in aviation history including Malaysia Airlines MH17 and MH370, Air France Flight 447, Germanwings Flight 9525, the Tenerife airport disaster, the Challenger and Columbia space shuttle disasters, the 2015 Sumatra Indonesian Air Force C-130 crash, the 1997 Irkutsk Antonov An-124 crash, and the Concorde Flight 4590 crash.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E05 - The Struggle
programme.desc: Laramy remains stuck at Camp Hell Hole, nursing 7s leg, and struggling to survive in the freezing temperatures without food.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E06 - On the Move
programme.desc: Laramy and Seven leave camp Hell Hole and hit the trail again. They are headed for lower elevation in search of a more permanent place to call home.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E07 - Permanent Residence
programme.desc: Laramy and Seven find a long term camping spot out fo the snow and at a lower elevation. Laramy gets to work making a more permanent shelter and looking for food.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E08 - Focused on Food
programme.desc: Laramy locates some whitetail deer and focuses his efforts on hunting them.

programme.title: Dropped - S01:E04 - The Rock Garden
programme.desc: On the third day at Prayer Point, Casey gets another chance... but not at the best moment. As Casey answers the call of nature, a bull answers back from the other side of the river, drawn in by the calls coming from the camp.

programme.desc: Laramy remains stuck at Camp Hell Hole, nursing 7s leg, and struggling to survive in the freezing temperatures without food.

programme.title: The Trail - S01:E06 - On the Move
programme.desc: Laramy and Seven leave camp Hell Hole and hit the trail again. They are headed for lower elevation in search of a more permanent place to call home.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E27 - Diana And Sarah The Royal Wives Of Windsor Part 1
programme.desc: As royal wives, both Diana and Fergie experienced a life filled with loneliness and sadness, despite their high hopes of bringing change to the House of Windsor. What was supposed to be their fairy-tale lives ended up being far from that reality.

programme.title: Dropped - S06:E03 - Risk and Reward
programme.desc: The Keefer Brothers make an important decision that vastly impacts their expedition. In a desperate search of necessary food, they attempt to hunt big game for the first time in New Zealand, and encounter a new set of challenges.

programme.title: Dropped - S06:E04 - Driving the Bus
programme.desc: Chris and Casey are introduced to the tastes of the New Zealand wild, and get a rude awakening. Mother Natures mind games start to mess with the brothers mental strength, while their inflatable raft continues to be a serious problem.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E12 - Operation Elk Dummy
programme.desc: Montana game wardens set out fake elk all over the state to try and catch potential poachers.

programme.title: Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots - S01:E03 - Deadmans Survival
programme.desc: Island Air battles time and the elements, to rescue a group trapped in Deadmans Bay.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E04 - SAS in Northern Ireland
programme.desc: The history of the British Empire colonial legacy in Northern Ireland is well known the world over but a there is a largely untold story of the the firefights between and close quarter battles exchanged between the provisional IRA, the British army and the elite SAS. Although the IRA often employed terrorist" techniques within the city of London and on Englands mainland not much is said of the often guerilla warfare techniques of the British Special Air Service in Northern Ireland since the beginning of this conflict. In this episode we will examine how the history of the Special Air Service affected the training of every elite force after it and how the close quarter battles in Northern Ireland in the late 1970s through to the millennium shaped both special forces and resistance methods.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S05:E03 - Wild Boar the Hard Way
programme.desc: Its another day in the Florida woods with Gods Country Outfitters hunting ferocious wild boar.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S05:E04 - Handcatching Fish in the Dark
programme.desc: Manny enters a dark world to hand catch Floridas largest freshwater fish.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S02:E04 - Elephant Country
programme.desc: Ivan joins the foremost anti-poaching team in Mozambique to bring down one particular group of poachers who have been killing local elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E30 - Prince William And Prince Harry Prisoners Of Celebrity
programme.desc: Two young men who have had to cope with extraordinarily challenging events and circumstances as, together, they have gone on to change the face of the British royal family and carve meaningful roles for themselves in the modern world. Made in 1999 two years after the death of their mother, Princess Diana, this original and touching documentary examines the lives of the royal princes, the legacy of their mother, the responsibilities of being a royal - and what the future holds for them.

programme.desc: Island Air battles time and the elements, to rescue a group trapped in Deadmans Bay.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E04 - SAS in Northern Ireland
programme.desc: The history of the British Empire colonial legacy in Northern Ireland is well known the world over but a there is a largely untold story of the the firefights between and close quarter battles exchanged between the provisional IRA, the British army and the elite SAS. Although the IRA often employed terrorist" techniques within the city of London and on Englands mainland not much is said of the often guerilla warfare techniques of the British Special Air Service in Northern Ireland since the beginning of this conflict. In this episode we will examine how the history of the Special Air Service affected the training of every elite force after it and how the close quarter battles in Northern Ireland in the late 1970s through to the millennium shaped both special forces and resistance methods.

programme.desc: Two young men who have had to cope with extraordinarily challenging events and circumstances as, together, they have gone on to change the face of the British royal family and carve meaningful roles for themselves in the modern world.
